original_definition: 'multi-drum household washing machine' means a household washing machine equipped with more than one drum, whether in separate units or in the same casing;
generated_definition: 'multi-drum household washing machine' means a household appliance designed to wash and dry multiple loads of laundry in a single cycle, typically consisting of multiple drums or tubs arranged in a row or column.

Article 2: ‘multi-drum household washing machine’ means a household washing machine equipped with more than one drum, whether in separate units or in the same casing;
Article 12: Multi-drum household washing machines and multi-drum household washer-dryers
